title: Haley Chiropractic Clinic
cleaned_text: Welcome to Haley Chiropractic Clinic Our mission at Haley Chiropractic is to provide quality care to people of all ages. We strive to not only correct a person's health problems, but to educate and enlighten people so that they do not encounter similar problems in the future. Our goal is to keep our patients updated and informed about Haley Chiropractic Clinic and the field of Chiropractic care. Our E-Newsletter offers monthly, informative articles related to chiropractic care. "The doctor of the future will give no medicine but will interest his patients in the care of the human frame, in diet and in the cause and prevention of disease. " -Thomas A. Edison
